New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 11 月 27 日星期三 04:15:31 +0000 zh 1每小时1
From fashion to quilts: Te Kawa’s journey culminates in Gisborne exhibition https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/from-fashion-to-quilts-te-kawas-journey-culminates-in-gisborne-exhibition/AA2WGHXX4JGEHFXF2RDVEOXFNE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/from-fashion-to-quilts-te-kawas-journey-culminates-in-gisborne-exhibition/AA2WGHXX4JGEHFXF2RDVEOXFNE/ Matai O'Connor, Kaupapa Māori reporterMaungarongo Te Kawa's quilt exhibition opens at Tairawhiti Museum, showcasing his journey. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Maungarongo (Ron) Te Kawa is looking forward to being home to open the final leg of his Te Whare Pora exhibition. Photo / Tink Lockett
New system for Gisborne Herald website PDFs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/new-system-for-gisborne-herald-website-pdfs/4SLGHN6K6RDPDIT5TWZWLJ2V64/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/new-system-for-gisborne-herald-website-pdfs/4SLGHN6K6RDPDIT5TWZWLJ2V64/ Subscribers can now access the latest digital edition of the Gisborne Herald in PDF form. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 03:45:18 +0000 The latest digital edition for the Gisborne Herald can be accessed in PDF form under "Today's digital edition" in the publication section. It will automatically update at 5am every morning.

Wed, 27 Nov 2024 03:34:41 +0000 Destination Skatepark is attracting people from all over the country, from seasoned pros to newbie skateboarders. Photo / Tauranga City Council

Photo / Mark Mitchell
Coroner rules inquiry won’t be opened into triple-fatal Wānaka helicopter crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-rules-inquiry-wont-be-opened-into-triple-fatal-wanaka-helicopter-crash/QLBVEAA7LVBKNBSVGVZAVYB3J4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-rules-inquiry-wont-be-opened-into-triple-fatal-wanaka-helicopter-crash/QLBVEAA7LVBKNBSVGVZAVYB3J4/ Ben TomsettNicholas Wallis, Scott Theobald and Paul Hondelink were killed in the crash in 2018. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 03:08:05 +0000 Nick Wallis, far left, Paul Hondelink and Scott Theobald died in a helicopter crash near Wānaka Airport in 2018. Wallis was the pilot, and Honedlink and Theobald were DoC rangers. Photo / Supplied
Fatal Waikato bus crash: State Highway 1 blocked, one dead as emergency services, helicopters respond https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/state-highway-1-crash-in-waikato-emergency-services-responding/G35ESX5VTZDXHIITQAXPEMJZVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/state-highway-1-crash-in-waikato-emergency-services-responding/G35ESX5VTZDXHIITQAXPEMJZVI/ Seven ambulances and five helicopters responded. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 03:01:20 +0000 A rescue helicopter lands on State Highway 1 in Waikato following a fatal two-vehicle crash which left 13 people with injuries on Wednesday, November 27, 2024.
Photo / Supplied
